The Dental School celebrated with Harnett County officials in Lillington at one of the  sites of community servicelearning centers where future students will provide lowcost care to rural communities PERIOD

The Division of Health Sciences has announced where the centers will be placed in North Carolina PERIOD Cities include Sylva Ahoskie and Elizabeth City which are strategically placed in areas of the state that are underserved when it comes to dental services PERIOD Although it will not be free to those in need it will provide lowcost care in areas without affordable dentistry PERIOD

Each site will be a fully functioning general dentistry office with  operatories Xray equipment educational spaces and more PERIOD Officials are working on the property deeds for the centers there and plan to open them by  in time for the newest class to be ready for a clinical PERIOD

Anticipation is building with the first enrolled class of the school starting in August of  PERIOD The centers are still under construction as well as the dental school building itself PERIOD Ross Hall was named after alumnus Dr PERIOD Ledyard E PERIOD Ross who pledged  million to the university for academic purposes to the School of Dentistry PERIOD His gift is one of the largest that the university has ever received PERIOD The school plans to admit  students each year after this upcoming fall PERIOD

Funds were allocated out of the  million the North Carolina General Assembly has provided for funding construction of the school and its outreach centers PERIOD Pledges by supporting alumni also contribute to the amount the school will need to build its reputation PERIOD

The core facility of the School of Dental Medicine will be located on the Health Sciences campus PERIOD During the first three years the students education will take place primarily on the campus here at ECU PERIOD But by the fourth year their education will take place in dedicated community clinical servicelearning centers located in areas around the state PERIOD

The Community Service Learning Clinical Centers will be unique in dental education providing a rich environment for practical community and patientfocused general education.The students get to work in a realistic clinical setting as well as provide the muchneeded oral health services to rural North Carolinians PERIOD

A grant of . million helped the school start construction on its first two community servicelearning centers one of  universities nationwide to receive grants through the competitive application process PERIOD Dr PERIOD Gregory Chadwick associate dean for Planning and Extramural Affairs led ECUs application process PERIOD Chadwick has described the sites as 

Sylva is located in Jackson County in the mountains west of Asheville PERIOD Ahoskie is in Hertford County about  miles south of the Virginia border and Elizabeth City is in Pasquotank County in northeastern North Carolina PERIOD
